entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 20 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 20 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 31 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 23 with temperature rising to minus 12 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 23 with temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. Wind chill minus 34 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 11.
